solution_line_template: If Marvin solved {marvin_yesterday} math problems yesterday, he has solved {marvin_yesterday}*{marvin_today_multiplier} = <<{marvin_yesterday}*{marvin_today_multiplier}={marvin_today}>>{marvin_today} math problems today.
The total number of math problems that Marvin has practiced is {marvin_today}+{marvin_yesterday} = <<{marvin_today}+{marvin_yesterday}={marvin_total}>>{marvin_total}
Arvin has practiced twice as many as Marvin, so has practiced {marvin_total} * {arvin_multiplier} = <<{marvin_total}*{arvin_multiplier}={arvin_total}>>{arvin_total} problems.
Together, Marvin and Arvin have solved {arvin_total}+{marvin_total} = <<{arvin_total}+{marvin_total}={total_practiced}>>{total_practiced} math problems.
